summary.para: Indicates whether the driver supports the specified combination of format and colorspace conversions.

param.name: InputFormat
param.para: The format of the video processor input.

param.name: InputColorSpace
param.para: The colorspace of the video processor input.

param.name: OutputFormat
param.para: The format of the video processor output.

param.name: OutputColorSpace
param.para: The colorspace of the video processor output.

param.name: pSupported
param.para: Pointer to a boolean that is set by the driver to indicate if the specified combination of format and colorspace conversions is supported. True if the conversion is supported; otherwise, false.

returns.para: This method returns one of the following error codes.

item.description: An invalid parameter was passed or this function was called using an invalid calling pattern.

summary.para: Enumerates the video processor capabilities of a Microsoft Direct3D 11 device.

remarks.para: To get a pointer to this interface, call .
